snippet.title: R-Type III & Super R-Type Collector's Edition
snippet.description:
PRE-ORDERS AVAILABLE NOW AT https://castlemaniagames.com/shop?olsPage=products%2Fcastlemania-games-exclusive-r-type-returns-collectors-set

Defend humanity against the power of the evil BYDO Empire in the classic intergalactic shooters in the R-Type III & Super R-Type Collector’s Edition. Published by Retro-Bit®, this bundle is loaded with exclusive collectibles and available for a limited time only.

Collector’s Edition includes:
• Exclusive Hard Embossed Collector’s Box to safely store all the collectibles
• Original Art Prints featuring the work of anime artist Otaking77077
• Retro-Bit x FigPin Limited Edition Enamel Pin Set to commemorate this limited release
• Hard Covered Notebook to document all your successful adventures
• Individually Numbered Certificate of Authenticity
• Full Color Instruction Manual with all the information you’ll need for gameplay
• Exclusive Sticker Collection featuring two sheets of vibrant designs
• Collectible Retail Box to keep your cartridge in pristine condition
• R-Type 16-Bit Cartridge compatible with original SNES® and Retro-Bit® consoles

MSRP: $59.99

Learn more at http://retro-bit.com/r-type
